alert.note: Alert for Chinati Mountains; Marfa Plateau; Presidio Valley (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 9:10PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Presidio County through 1000 PM CDT... At 910 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 20 miles northeast of Chinati Mountains, or 21 miles southwest of Marfa, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Casa Piedra. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Chinati Mountains; Marfa Plateau; Presidio Valley
